contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 10, 1892 D Stamford Contest
Stamford Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
stamford-contest
None
Burghley House, Stamford, Lincolnshire, England, UK Prizes: £15 + cornet and medal, £7 and 8 guinea soprano, £5 and 7 guinea trombone
March contest: 1: (£1) Kingston Mills 2: Gainsborough
Organised by Stamford Town Band.
Northampton Herald 16th September, 1892
Gainsborough conductor Edwin Swift is also listed as having adjudicated at Hawick in the Scottish Borders on this day, also attested by newspaper report. Both cannot be right! http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/hawick-contest/1892-09-10/
